channel.title: Anti-Dupe Bug [Delta]
channel.description:
i followed a tutorial to add anti-dupe. i did and now if i trade with someone. and he accept the trade.
we both cant run till we relog. but when one of us relog, there is a dupe. if he logs out , i get my item back.
can someone help me?
thx grts, Mr Tekkah
